table_caption: Associations between SVD markers and rich club organization.
table_foot: Associations of the conventional SVD markers WMH, lacunes and microbleeds with structural network measures. WMH volumes were log-transformed because of skewedness. Data are displayed as standardized betas [95% confidence intervals], analyzed using linear regression analyses. *p<0.05; **p<0.01; ***p<0.001.
